Key Match Events: Bo Naylor hit a leadoff homer in the seventh inning
Steven Kwan and Andrés Giménez had back-to-back singles in the seventh inning
The Guardians scored six hits in the seventh inning, the most in a single inning for the team all year
Jhonkensy Noel had an RBI single in the seventh inning
Andrés Giménez made a leaping catch to record an out in the eighth inning
Pre-Game Insights: Guardians manager Stephen Vogt emphasized the importance of his team stepping back, exhaling, and playing like they did in the first five months of the season
Vogt knew it was harder said than done, but he believed that the team just needed one ball to drop in for a clutch base hit
Post-Match Reflections: Vogt praised the team's response to being down by three runs, saying 'that was such a great response from our guys today'
Tanner Bibee said the team's mindset stays the same, and they just need to keep plugging away
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Guardians' win was a comeback victory, as they trailed by three runs before scoring four runs in the seventh inning
The team's win was a confidence booster at the most critical point of the season thus far
The Guardians will cling to their one-game lead in the division race and need to build on the momentum established Wednesday
